name: Downward (demo)
description:
This is a demo for a game that I'm developing called downward made by only just me, no one else in this project. 

You play as a imp named gimmitri, a amnesiac adventurous imp with little care in the world. And despite the lack of flying due to your weak body, you still have a strong spirit. But strange this have been happening, as if not all things are as they seem.

--controls--

A to fire

B to jump

Start to bring up the pause menu and select certain actions

Down to interact with mpcs in platforming sections 

Please note that this demo is a work in progress and any bugs are still being ironed out. And some stuff is still not final, feedback is very much welcome.
